Comments: Our main 2 issues are lead times and communication. We have a customer base that will not be okay with lead times 3+ weeks out and then quoted run dates that are not met. Communication is also sub par. We ask questions that more often than not are not answered same day and sometimes just go unanswered. If this continues we will be forced to make alternative arrangements for a portion of our tonnage.

Overall, pretty easy to work with. But a more prompt response time to questions and requests, even if it's not the answer we want to hear, would be appreciated. Some emails and calls go completely unanswered.
Everyone @ MSP is awesome. Orders done in a timely manner.
Everyone at MSP is a joy to work with very helpful goes the extra mile to take good care of us and we thank you! Kenny
Alissa has been a nice addition. I do not handle MSP day to day but to my experience, I have no complaints and MSP continues to exceed expectations when I need help. Mike Davis OP Coordinator.
Dasha has improved drastically. Pricing is the highest we pay compared to the copetition. Growing pains in the processing department. -WH

Only issue right now is that lead times are extended to 10-12 business days, when they used to be 4-5. I was told they would be improving but they haven't really changed and I can't get an answer on when they will hopefully be better, which makes it very tough to know how much inventory to have cut. We run on very lean inventories, so short lead times are crucial to how we operate.
Single point material is late most of the time. Once material is on the floor it takes 3+ weeks to have material processed.

In the short time I have delt with Mississippi Steel, Caryn has been an absolute pleasure to work with and has kept me well informnend on where my product is at through the process. I am very pleased with your service and the speed at which you are able to process my orders. Thank you.
Megin does a great job on taking care of my orders for Union Tank.
Customer service is much improved along with the scheduling of appointments to pick-up finished goods.
Great Job!

Sometimes it very hard to get anyone on the phone. There are somethings that are a lots easier and faster if you can talk to someone instead of email. They all seem to to be very busy but sometimes it take days to get a current inventory or production updates. The processing is always done properly and the shipping department is pretty easy to work with. The pricing is a lot higher than other processors that I use.
Lead times on the stretcher have moved back towards 5 days, which is great for us to run our business
Leann does her best to take really good care of us
Pricing seems to be higher than most, and lead times can get extended out. Other than that, very good performance
Pricing could be aligned with other processors that we deal with.
Pricing needs to be be more inline with other processors.
You folks do a great job....
My location has not done much business with MSP but Caryn has done a good job setting and meeting expectations for me on the few jobs I have had.
NA

Overall, we have a tremendous working relationship with the team at MSP; Caryn Bivens in particular is a fantastic customer service representative and goes above and beyond in assisting our entire organization.
Our Customer Rep/Mill Liaison does an outstanding job of entering our processing orders and letting us know of problems or concerns in a timely manner
With the nature of our business the MSP leadtimes are always an issue.
Keep up the good work!
Caryn is great
We love working with MSP.  Everyone is very helpful and always on top of all of our requests and needs.
I don't deal with pricing personally. However, I will say coordinating the movement of material to and from MSP is painless. Questions are answered quickly, and they are always willing to help.
Working with everyone is a pleasure. LeAnn Bishop and the girls are very helpful.
We are a new customer, very satisfied with the service!
Megin, Jim and shipping and whomever works on Union Tank does a great job for us!!! Keep up the great work !!!!
Greatly appreciate our relationship. Thanks MSP!
Thank you for all of your help!! Hoping to bring in new business to MSP in 2024
Customer Service has improved.
Very satisfied with the service we get from MSP
